issue.title: [CF 696] Tracking Molten Core
issue.body:
Hi!

I tried to track my Buff "Molten Core" with TellMeWhen like i do with other Buffs/Spells aswell, but i don't get this thing to work.

This is what I've tried so far:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^S122351 ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N60447^S`| ^Sicon^^

Tell me what I'm doing wrong.

Cheers!

PS: As I used google to solve this problem on my own, I found many Warlocks with the same issue about this Buff.


> Posted by CurseForge user penisknight | Imported from CurseForge issue #696 | Raw

comments.body:
You are using the incorrect spellID to track this buff. As a general rule of thumb, you should always check buffs and debuffs by their name instead of by their ID unless there is a specific reason why you need to track a specific ID of a spell (to distinguish between different spells with the same name)

Just change the spellID (122351) to the spell name (Molten Core) and you should be good to go.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I am going to close this ticket now. If you need more help with this issue, please feel free to reply to this ticket and I will do my best to assist you!
